title: The Dangerous Trek to America
description:
Leaving everything they know and love behind, thousands of Honduran migrants are making the dangerous trek to the U.S.-Mexico border. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg News Central America reporter Michael McDonald on the difficult journey they face and why they've chosen to make it. 
FOLLOW UP
 Michael's latest report: Trump’s Threats Fail to Deter Migrants Fleeing Gangs and Drought
You can follow Michael at: @mdmcdonald
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
